Module WitchHunt
Package fr.sos.witchhunt.view.gui.scenes.game

Class Notification

java.lang.Object
fr.sos.witchhunt.view.gui.scenes.game.Notification
public class Notification extends Object

Defines a notification to be displayed as a text message.

Associated with a Theme, which determines the Notification's color (and can also determine its text).

See Also:
  • Theme
  • Notifications are used in NotificationBoxes to display messages.
  • They are also used by other components like the DeckSelectorButtons to customize their color based on a Theme.

  • Field Details

    • text

      private String text

      The message delivered by this Notification.

      Will be displayed when using NotificationsBox::printNotification(Notification).

      See Also:
      • NotificationsBox
      • NotificationsBox::printNotification(Notification)

    • fg

      private Color fg

      The Color associated with this Notification.

      A message displayed in a NotificationsBox will have this color.

      Determined by the Theme used at instantiation.

      See Also:
      • NotificationsBox
      • NotificationsBox::printNotification(Notification)
      • Can be used to style up buttons' background or borders based on a Theme

  • Constructor Details

    • Notification

      public Notification(String text, Theme type)
      Creates a Notification with the given message and the given theme.
      Parameters:
      text - The message to be associated with this Notification.
      type - The theme to be associated with this Notification. Defines a type of Notification

    • Notification

      public Notification(Theme type)

      Creates a Notification based on the given theme.

      The Theme determines the Notification's color.

      Some Themes like Theme.LIGHT_SEPARATOR will also determine the message associated with this Notification.

      Parameters:
      type - The theme categorizing this Notification and defining its color.

  • Method Details

    • getFg

      public Color getFg()

    • getText

      public String getText()

    • makeAttributeSet

      public SimpleAttributeSet makeAttributeSet()
      Makes a SimpleAttributeSet out of this Notification's color.

      Used when displaying this notifications into a StyledDocument (see NotificationsBox).

      Returns:
      A SimpleAttributeSet only containing information relative to the Font's foreground color, which is set to this Notification's color.
      See Also:
      • NotificationsBox is used to display Notifications into a javax.swing.text.StyledDocument
